title: test_auth_api_login_functionality
description: Verify that the /api/auth/login endpoint correctly authenticates users with valid credentials and rejects invalid login attempts.

title: test_invoices_api_create_and_list_invoices
description: Validate that the /api/invoices POST endpoint creates invoices with required fields and the GET endpoint lists all invoices accurately.

title: test_clients_api_create_and_list_clients
description: Ensure the /api/clients POST endpoint creates clients with mandatory fields and the GET endpoint retrieves the list of clients correctly.

title: test_stock_api_warehouses_management
description: Test the /api/stock/warehouses GET endpoint for listing warehouses and POST endpoint for creating new warehouses with valid data.

title: test_stock_api_transfer_stock_between_warehouses
description: Verify that the /api/stock/transfer POST endpoint correctly transfers stock quantities between warehouses and handles errors for invalid transfers.

title: test_stock_api_adjust_stock_quantity
description: Check that the /api/stock/adjust POST endpoint adjusts stock quantities accurately and validates input data properly.

title: test_dashboard_api_get_metrics
description: Validate that the /api/dashboard GET endpoint returns real-time financial KPIs and metrics reflecting the current state of the system.

title: test_team_api_manage_team_members
description: Test the /api/team GET endpoint for listing team members, POST endpoint for inviting new members, and PATCH endpoint for updating member roles.
